text: Jevha tumhi cadhata jata hote ani mage valuna konala pahatahi navhate, ani allahace rasula (paigambara) tumhala pathimaguna haka marita hote, tevha tumhala duhkhavara duhkha pohacale, yasathi ki tumhi apalya hatuna nisatalelya (vijaya) vara duhkha na karave ani na tya (manasika aghata) vara, jo tumhala pohacala, ani allaha tumacya sarva karmanna cangale janato
